summary.span: 表示 Windows 注册表中的项级节点。

span.span: Represents a key-level node in the Windows registry.

summary.span: 此类是注册表封装。

span.span: This class is a registry encapsulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取的实例, 请使用类的静态成员之一。To get an instance of , use one of the static members of the class. 注册表充当计算机上的操作系统和应用程序的信息的中央存储库。The registry acts as a central repository of information for the operating system and the applications on a computer. 注册表是按照分层格式组织的, 它基于存储在其中的元素的逻辑排序 (有关此层次结构中的基本级别项, 请参阅)。The registry is organized in a hierarchical format, based on a logical ordering of the elements stored within it (please see for the base-level items in this hierarchy). 在注册表中存储信息时, 请根据存储的信息类型选择适当的位置。When storing information in the registry, select the appropriate location based on the type of information being stored. 请确保避免破坏其他应用程序创建的信息, 因为这可能会导致这些应用程序出现意外的行为, 并且还可能会对自己的应用程序造成不利影响。Be sure to avoid destroying information created by other applications, because this can cause those applications to exhibit unexpected behavior, and can also have an adverse effect upon your own application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型, 请`try` / `catch`在块中调用其方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息, 请参阅接口主题中的 "使用实现 IDisposable 的对象" 一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 注册表项是注册表中组织的基本单位, 可以与文件资源管理器中的文件夹进行比较。Registry keys are the base unit of organization in the registry, and can be compared to folders in File Explorer. 某个特定键可以有子项, 就像文件夹可以有子文件夹一样。A particular key can have subkeys, just as a folder can have subfolders. 只要用户具有相应的权限来执行此操作, 则每个密钥都可以删除, 并且该密钥不是基本密钥, 也不是基本密钥下直接的级别。Each key can be deleted, as long as the user has the appropriate permissions to do so, and the key is not a base key or at the level directly under the base keys. 每个键还可以有多个关联的值 (可与文件进行比较), 这些值用于存储信息-例如, 有关计算机上安装的应用程序的信息。Each key can also have multiple values associated with it (a value can be compared to a file), which are used to store the information - for example, information about an application installed on the computer. 每个值都包含一条特定的信息, 可在需要时检索或更新。Each value holds one particular piece of information, which can be retrieved or updated when required. 例如, 可以在密钥 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software 下为公司创建, 然后为公司创建的每个应用程序创建子项。For instance, you can create a for your company, under the key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software, and then a subkey for each application that your company creates. 每个子项保存特定于该应用程序的信息, 如颜色设置、屏幕位置和大小, 或者可识别的文件扩展名。Each subkey holds the information specific to that application, such as color settings, screen location and size, or recognized file extensions. 请注意, 存储在注册表中的信息可供其他应用程序和用户使用, 因此不应用于存储安全数据或关键应用程序信息。Note that information stored in the registry is available to other applications and users, and therefore should not be used to store security data or critical application information. > [!CAUTION] > 不要以这样的方式公开对象: 恶意程序可能会创建数千个无意义子项或键/值对。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如, 不允许调用方输入任意密钥或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. 从开始, 注册表项的长度不再限制为255个字符。 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the length of a registry key is no longer limited to 255 characters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 HKEY_CURRENT_USER 下创建一个子项, 操作其内容, 然后删除该子项。The following code example shows how to create a subkey under HKEY_CURRENT_USER, manipulate its contents, and then delete the subkey. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 关闭该项，如果其内容已修改，则将其刷新到磁盘。

span.span: Closes the key and flushes it to disk if its contents have been modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对系统键调用此方法不起任何作用, 因为系统密钥永远不会关闭。Calling this method on system keys will have no effect, because system keys are never closed. 如果在已关闭`RegistryKey`的实例上调用此方法, 则此方法不执行任何操作。This method does nothing if you call it on an instance of `RegistryKey` that is already closed. ## Examples 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey2/VB/source.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个注册表项, 该注册表项具有`registrySecurity`参数指定的访问控制。 The method creates a registry key that has the access control specified by the `registrySecurity` parameter. 返回的对象表示注册表项, 但该对象不受`registrySecurity`参数中指定的访问控制限制。The object that is returned represents the registry key, but that object is not restricted by the access control specified in the `registrySecurity` parameter. 如果`permissionCheck` 为, 则打开密钥以进行读/写访问。If `permissionCheck` is , the key is opened for read/write access. 如果`permissionCheck` 为, 则打开密钥以进行读访问。If `permissionCheck` is , the key is opened for read access. 为实现向后兼容性, 如果`permissionCheck`为 , 则打开密钥以进行读取和写入, 并且父键也具有。For backward compatibility, the key is opened for reading and writing if `permissionCheck` is and the parent key also has . 如果父项具有任何其他设置, 则读取/写入状态由父项的设置控制。If the parent key has any other setting, read/write status is controlled by the parent key's setting. 要执行此操作, 用户必须在注册表层次结构中具有此级别和下面的权限。In order to perform this action, the user must have permissions at this level and below in the registry hierarchy. > [!CAUTION] > 不要以这样的方式公开对象: 恶意程序可能会创建数千个无意义子项或键/值对。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如, 不允许调用方输入任意密钥或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. 若要使用方法, 必须具有类的实例。In order to use the method, you must have an instance of the class. 若要获取的实例, 请使用类的静态成员之一。To get an instance of , use one of the static members of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`throwOnMissingValue` 为`false`, 则无法判断删除是否成功, 无需再尝试访问刚删除的值。If `throwOnMissingValue` is `false`, there is no way to tell if the deletion was successful, without subsequently trying to access the value just deleted. 因此, 以这种方式从注册表中删除值时, 请务必小心。Therefore, use caution when deleting values from the registry in this manner. 在 windows 95、windows 98、windows 98 Second edition 和 windows Millennium edition 上, 为`name`参数指定一个空字符串不会删除默认值。On Windows 95, Windows 98, Windows 98 Second Edition, and Windows Millennium Edition, specifying an empty string for the `name` parameter does not delete the default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用`Dispose`后, 必须释放对的所有引用, 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: 将指定的打开注册表项的全部特性写到注册表中。

span.span: Writes all the attributes of the specified open registry key into the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要调用`Flush`来写出对键的更改。It is not necessary to call `Flush` to write out changes to a key. 当注册表使用其惰性惰性时, 注册表更改会刷新到磁盘。Registry changes are flushed to disk when the registry uses its lazy flusher. 在系统指定的时间间隔后, 延迟刷新会自动进行。Lazy flushing occurs automatically and regularly after a system-specified time interval. 系统关闭时, 注册表更改也会刷新到磁盘。Registry changes are also flushed to disk at system shutdown. 与不同的`Flush`是, 仅当所有数据都已写入注册表时, 函数才返回。Unlike , the `Flush` function returns only when all the data has been written to the registry. `Flush`函数还可能会写出或所有其他键的部分。The `Flush` function might also write out parts of or all of the other keys. 过度调用此函数可能对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Calling this function excessively can have a negative effect on an application's performance. 仅当应用程序必须`Flush`为绝对时才应调用, 以便将注册表更改记录到磁盘中。An application should only call `Flush` if it must be absolute certain that registry changes are recorded to disk. 通常情况`Flush`下, 很少需要使用。In general, `Flush` rarely, if ever, need be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以有一个不与任何名称关联的值。A registry key can have one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示此未命名值时, 将显示字符串 "(默认值)", 而不是名称。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要检索此未命名值, `null`请为`name`指定或为空字符串 ("")。To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`. 当方法检索可扩充字符串值 () 时, 它将使用本地环境中的数据展开环境字符串。 When the method retrieves expandable string values (), it expands environment strings using data from the local environment. 若要从远程计算机上的注册表中检索可扩充字符串值, 请使用方法重载来指定你不希望扩展环境字符串。To retrieve expandable string values from the registry on a remote computer, use the method overload to specify that you do not want environment strings expanded. > [!NOTE] > 如果包含对环境变量的可扩充引用的值存储为字符串 (), 而不是作为可扩充字符串 (), 则不会对其进行扩展。If a value containing expandable references to environment variables has been stored as a string (), rather than as an expandable string (), does not expand it. 您可以通过调用方法来扩展此类字符串。You can expand such a string after it has been retrieved by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 从键检索数据的建议方法是使用类, 而不是方法。The recommended way to retrieve data from the key is to use the class rather than the method. > > 不支持读取 REG_NONE 或 REG_LINK 类型的值。 does not support reading values of type REG_NONE or REG_LINK. 在这两种情况下, 将`null`返回默认值 (), 而不是实际值。In both cases, the default value (`null`) is returned instead of the actual value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个测试键, 并向该键添加不同数据类型的值。The following code example creates a test key and adds values of different data types to the key. 然后, 该示例读取名称/值对, 并使用方法检索相应的注册表数据类型, 将其显示在控制台中。The example then reads the name/value pairs and displays them to the console, using the method to retrieve the corresponding registry data types. Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个具有值的测试键并检索该值。The following code example creates a test key with a value and retrieves that value. 然后, 该示例尝试从该键检索不存在的值;在这种情况下, 该方法将返回指定的默认值。The example then attempts to retrieve a nonexistent value from the key; in this case the method returns the specified default value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载可指定对检索到的值进行特殊处理。Use this overload to specify special processing of the retrieved value. 例如, 可以指定在检索类型的注册表值时检索字符串, 而无需扩展嵌入的环境变量。For example, you can specify when retrieving a registry value of type to retrieve the string without expanding embedded environment variables. `defaultValue` 如果`name`不存在, 请使用参数来指定要返回的值。Use the `defaultValue` parameter to specify the value to return if `name` does not exist. > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以有一个不与任何名称关联的值。A registry key can have one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示此未命名值时, 将显示字符串 "(默认值)", 而不是名称。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要检索此未命名值, `null`请为`name`指定或为空字符串 ("")。To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`. > > 不支持读取 REG_NONE 或 REG_LINK 类型的值。 does not support reading values of type REG_NONE or REG_LINK. 在这两种情况下, 将`null`返回默认值 (), 而不是实际值。In both cases, the default value (`null`) is returned instead of the actual value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个测试键, 添加一个具有嵌入的环境变量的值, 并在展开和未展开的窗体中检索值。The following code sample creates a test key, adds a value with an embedded environment variable, and retrieves the value in both expanded and unexpanded forms. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`machineName`为, 则会打开本地计算机注册表。The local machine registry is opened if `machineName` is . 请求的密钥必须是远程计算机上的根密钥, 并由适当的值标识。The requested key must be a root key on the remote machine, and is identified by the appropriate value. 为了远程打开密钥, 服务器和客户端计算机都必须运行远程注册表服务, 并启用远程管理。In order for a key to be opened remotely, both the server and client machines must be running the remote registry service, and have remote administration enabled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在远程计算机上打开注册表项并枚举该项的值。The following code example shows how to open a registry key on a remote computer and enumerate the values of the key. 远程计算机必须运行远程注册表服务。The remote computer must be running the remote registry service. 调用程序时, 将远程计算机的名称指定为命令行参数。Specify the name of the remote computer as a command-line argument when invoking the program. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要修改注册表项的权限, 请使用方法获取表示现有 Windows 访问控制安全性的对象, 修改该对象, 然后使用方法更新的安全性键。To modify permissions for a registry key, use the method to obtain a object representing the existing Windows access control security, modify that object, and then use the method to update security for the key. > [!CAUTION] > 为指定用于`registrySecurity`替换注册表项的现有安全性的对象。The object specified for `registrySecurity` replaces the existing security for the registry key. 若要为新用户添加权限, 请使用方法获取现有的访问控制安全性, 然后对其进行修改。To add permissions for a new user, use the method to obtain the existing access control security, and then modify it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个测试键。The following code example creates a test key. 允许当前用户和权限, 但被拒绝和权限。The current user is allowed and rights but denied and rights. 后续尝试操作密钥的操作将会成功或失败, 具体取决于这些权限。Subsequent attempts to manipulate the key succeed or fail depending on these permissions. 在删除密钥之前, 代码将暂停。Before the key is deleted, the code pauses. 当使用注册表编辑器访问密钥时, 可以切换到注册表编辑器, 验证是否应用了相同的访问权限。You can switch to the registry editor and verify that the same access rights apply when the key is accessed using the registry editor. (如果从命令行使用**RunAs**来运行注册表编辑器, 并使用示例代码作为本地用户, 而无需管理员权限, 这种方法最有效。(This works best if you use **RunAs** from the command line to run the registry editor and the sample code as a local user without administrator rights. 注册表编辑器始终允许管理员更改权限, 即使特定管理员拒绝了这些权限。The registry editor always allows an administrator to change permissions, even if the particular administrator has been denied those rights. 如果你已定义了名为 TestUser 的本地用户, `runas /user:TestUser cmd`则该命令将打开一个命令窗口, 你可以在其中运行注册表编辑器, 然后运行示例代码。)If you have defined a local user named TestUser, the command `runas /user:TestUser cmd` opens a command window from which you can run the registry editor and then the sample code.) remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于注册表中的每个键都可以存储许多值, 因此必须使用`name`参数来指定要设置的特定值。Because many values can be stored in each key in the registry, you must use the `name` parameter to specify the particular value you want to set. > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以有一个不与任何名称关联的值。A registry key can have one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示此未命名值时, 将显示字符串 "(默认值)", 而不是名称。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要设置此未命名值, `null`请为`name`指定或为空字符串 ("")。To set this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`. 若要设置项中的值, 必须使用写访问权限打开该项。In order to set values in a key, you must open the key with write access. 打开具有写访问权限的项后, 可以更改该项中的任何名称/值对。After you have opened a key with write access, you can change any of the name/value pairs in that key. 如果密钥中`name`不存在指定的, 则会创建它, 并将关联的值设置为`value`。If the specified `name` does not exist in the key, it is created and the associated value is set to `value`. 此重载将64位整数存储为字符串 ()。This overload of stores 64-bit integers as strings (). 若要将64位数字存储为值, 请使用指定的重载。To store 64-bit numbers as values, use the overload that specifies . 此重载将所有字符串值存储为, 即使它们包含对环境变量的可展开引用。This overload of stores all string values as , even if they contain expandable references to environment variables. 若要将字符串值保存为可扩充字符串 (), 请使用指定的重载。To save string values as expandable strings (), use the overload that specifies . 此方法重载将非32位整数以外的数值类型存储为字符串。Numeric types other than 32-bit integers are stored as strings by this method overload. 枚举元素作为包含元素名称的字符串存储。Enumeration elements are stored as strings containing the element names. > [!CAUTION] > 不要以这样的方式公开对象: 恶意程序可能会创建数千个无意义子项或键/值对。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如, 不允许调用方输入任意密钥或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 中, 注册表不是 Unicode, 并且并非所有 Unicode 字符对于所有代码页都有效。On Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition the registry is not Unicode, and not all Unicode characters are valid for all code pages. 对于当前代码页无效的 Unicode 字符被替换为最佳可用匹配项。A Unicode character that is invalid for the current code page is replaced by the best available match. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了方法在设置值时如何确定注册表数据类型。The following code example shows how the method determines the registry data type when it sets values. 该示例创建一个测试键, 并将不同数据类型的值添加到该键。The example creates a test key and adds values of different data types to the key. 然后, 该示例将读取名称/值对, 并将其显示在控制台中 , 方法是使用方法来显示相应的注册表数据类型。The example then reads the name/value pairs and displays them to the console, using the method to display the corresponding registry data types. specified `valueKind`, and the data cannot be converted, is thrown. 例如, 可以将存储 为, 但前提是它的值小于的最大值。For example, you can store a as a , but only if its value is less than the maximum value of a . 不能将单个字符串值存储为。You cannot store a single string value as a . > [!NOTE] > 如果为或传递装箱值, 则将使用固定区域性完成转换。If boxed values are passed for or , the conversion is done using the invariant culture. > [!CAUTION] > 不要以这样的方式公开对象: 恶意程序可能会创建数千个无意义子项或键/值对。Do not expose objects in such a way that a malicious program could create thousands of meaningless subkeys or key/value pairs. 例如, 不允许调用方输入任意密钥或值。For example, do not allow callers to enter arbitrary keys or values. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 中, 注册表不是 Unicode, 并且并非所有 Unicode 字符对于所有代码页都有效。On Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition the registry is not Unicode, and not all Unicode characters are valid for all code pages. 对于当前代码页无效的 Unicode 字符被替换为最佳可用匹配项。A Unicode character that is invalid for the current code page is replaced by the best available match. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个测试键, 并使用方法存储多个值, 并为每个值指定注册表数据类型。The following code example creates a test key and uses the method to store several values, specifying the registry data type for each value. 然后, 该示例将读取名称/值对, 并将其显示在控制台中 , 方法是使用方法来显示相应的注册表数据类型。The example then reads the name/value pairs and displays them to the console, using the method to display the corresponding registry data types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个注册表项都有一个默认值, 该默认值不与任何名称关联。Each registry key has a default value that is not associated with any name. 可以通过使用方法并为`null` `name`指定或空字符串 ("") 来设置此未命名值。This unnamed value can be set by using the method and specifying either `null` or the empty string ("") for `name`. 如果从未设置默认值, 则它不会影响属性返回的总数; 但是, 在设置后, 它将始终计数。If the default value has never been set, it does not contribute to the total count returned by the property; once it has been set, however, it is always counted. ## Examples 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在64位版本的 Windows 上, 将分别为32位和64位应用程序存储注册表部分。On the 64-bit versions of Windows, portions of the registry are stored separately for 32-bit and 64-bit applications. 对于32位应用程序, 有32位视图, 适用于64位应用程序的64位视图。There is a 32-bit view for 32-bit applications and a 64-bit view for 64-bit applications. 不要假设视图始终与的实际视图相对应。Do not assume that the view always corresponds to the actual view of the .
